A full-stack robotics framework featuring Frontier Exploration, A* Path Planning, and Object Detection.

Waymo Obstacle Detection

Camera-only obstacle detection on the Waymo Open Dataset using Mask R-CNN, DETR, Deformable DETR, and DeepLabv3+.
